definition: Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
voluntarism/metaphysical view, esp. due to Schopenhauer 叔本華|叔本华[Shu1 ben3 hua2], that the essence of the world is willpower

pinyin: De2 yi4 zhi4 Xue2 shu4 Jiao1 liu2 Zhong1 xin1
De2 yi4 zhi4 Min2 zhu3 Gong4 he2 guo2

definition: Federal Republic of Germany/former West Germany 1945-1990, now simply Germany
pinyin: De2 yi4 zhi4 Lian2 bang1 Gong4 he2 guo2
zi4 you2 yi4 zhi4 zhu3 yi4

sentences.english: Fourth, the failure is beyond the unit's will.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪行爲未達既遂是由於單位意志以外的原因。

sentences.english: He thoroughly takes the German national charater apart in the essay.
sentences.chinese: 他在這篇文章裏透徹地剖析了德意志民族性格。

sentences.english: Hitlers come and go, but Germany and the German people remain.
sentences.chinese: 希特勒來了又走，德意志與德國人民長存。

sentences.english: Train your will to concentrate on a limited objective.
sentences.chinese: 要訓練自己的意志集中在有限的目標。

sentences.english: In these words, a correct expression is given to the finitude of Will.
sentences.chinese: 這樣便已經正確說出意志的有限性了。

sentences.english: Then doubts and fears did assail the very strongest .
sentences.chinese: 疑惑和恐懼的確困擾過意志最堅強的人。

sentences.english: Eat what thing to belong to individual psychokinesis problem, wash a face?
sentences.chinese: 喫什麼東西屬個人意志力問題，洗臉呢？

sentences.english: Luleng deems that public will is a sublimation of human's free volitions .
sentences.chinese: 盧梭認爲，公意就是人類自由意志的昇華。

sentences.english: The warrant once granted, your will of course directed everything.
sentences.chinese: 逮捕令一旦批了下來，你的意志當然就主宰一切了。

sentences.english: One of the bad ones is its willingness to lock up its citizens (see our briefing).
sentences.chinese: 而其中的一個不好的差別就是它關自己人的意志。

sentences.english: We can keep out, if we have the resolute national will to do so.
sentences.chinese: 美國可以置身戰爭之外，只要全國人民意志堅定。

sentences.english: The wills of states are the foundation for EIL.
sentences.chinese: 國家意志是國際法強制執行的根據。

sentences.english: Difficulties strengthen the mind, an labor does the body.
sentences.chinese: 勞動鍛鍊身體，困難鍛鍊意志。

sentences.english: The attribute of examination is to embody the state's will-power.
sentences.chinese: 體現國家意志是考試的屬性。

sentences.english: I've got enough will power to get you out of my life for good.
sentences.chinese: 我已經有了足夠的意志力來將你永遠驅除出我的生命。

sentences.english: How should the person raise his psychokinesis?
sentences.chinese: 人要怎麼提高自己的意志力？
